title: Level Up Python Skills: Beyond the Fundamentals
description: Having mastered the basics of Python programming, you're ready to take your skills to the next level! This course builds upon your foundation, equipping you with practical tools and techniques to tackle more complex problems.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
learning_outcomes.content: In-depth exploration of lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets. Learn powerful algorithms for sorting, searching, and manipulating data efficiently.

learning_outcomes.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
learning_outcomes.content: Understand the core concepts of OOP - classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism - to create well-organized and reusable code.

learning_outcomes.title: Exception Handling
learning_outcomes.content: Gracefully handle errors and unexpected situations in your programs, making them more robust.

learning_outcomes.title: File Handling
learning_outcomes.content: Work with text and data files, reading, writing, and manipulating data stored on your computer.

learning_outcomes.title: Web Scraping and APIs
learning_outcomes.content: Extract data from websites and interact with Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) to access information from various online sources.

learning_outcomes.title: Testing and Debugging
learning_outcomes.content: Develop best practices for testing and debugging your Python code, ensuring its functionality and reliability.

modules.title: Capstone Project
topics: Apply your skills to a real-world project
